__e: -It has been many years that I wanted to arrest this guy. He is the worst villain of the country.
Of our hills the worst highwayman, The bloodsucker of our peaceful land,
At least a couple of people, Including the thug, who shot me.
Get lost now, if she sees that face of a bandit you have, she'll chase you too! Go away!
This time he's going to jail like the thug he is.
'Hello, Mike. 'I guess you know you're running with a real desperado this time.
He's not yet a bandit, but he could turn out to be the greatest bandit of all times.
You throw a gangster out a train going 80 MPH and then you throw a second one... how much time passes between the 2 events? If the train doesn't change speed between?
Not only that she is older than him and from a bandit's house, but she is a whore!
At least he never made himself out to be anything but a crook and a killer.
On the contrary: I said do I look like a crook and you said yes so I took it for granted that you knew it wasn't exactly honest.
